block.comment: not synchronized because the OHC broadcast the commands, but the kilobots can receive this signal some millisecond later, and so, the kiloticks start later.

block.field: the kilobot 1 chose a color, the kilobot that have this color become the Witch
the witch chose a color, the kilobot that have this color become the Target kilobot (or runner)
Every bot stop to listen the witch and start to try to catch the target, when the witch broadcast the target color
Creation of a Network which includes all kilobots
This will Allows to coordinate, giving to kilobots information about distances from the others and from the target bot. Give a sort of "relative positioning" information.
Utilization of an appropriate communication protocol
To exchange information that kilobots need to play the game in the right way
Kilobots will operate in a space of at least 100x80cm
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Environment : Witheboard 2. Thing : board

block.field: For Infrared the surface is glossy and reflective
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Environment : Witheboard 2. Thing : board

block.field: The SoS will be composed of at least 5 kilobots and a controller (One witch, 2 players and 2 colors)

block.field: At the beginning of the program execution we have assigned positions for Kilobots

block.field: Each Kilobots will have ID, Color and Positions

block.field: At the beginning when the game starts the player search the color and witch search the player

block.field: Witch and players kilobots waiting for the signal to each other to run

block.field: The target color will be chosen by program itself

block.field: During the game all of the kilobots like witch and players searching each other

block.field: During the game the witch trying to catch the players and the players will be searching the color. If witch catch the players then this player will be the witch for the next round of the game

block.field: The round will be finished when players kilobots catch the color

block.field: A kilobot will be able to estimate relative distance from other bots from the Environment
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Controlled object : infrared sensor 2. Controlled object : infrared sensor 3. Controlled object : infrared sensor 4. Controlled object : infrared sensor 5. Controlled object : infrared sensor 6. Controlled object : infrared sensor 7. Controlled object : infrared sensor 8. Controlled object : infrared sensor 9. Controlled object : infrared sensor 10. Controlled object : infrared sensor

block.field: A kilobot will operate in one of at least three states: run, bootload or sleep
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State space : Motions 2. State space : Motions 3. State space : Motions 4. State space : Motions 5. State space : Motions 6. State space : Motions 7. State space : Motions 8. State space : Motions

block.field: Through a message interface each kilobot will be able to communicate to every other kilobit.
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Msg_bot0 2. RUMI : Msg_bot1 3. RUMI : Msg_bot2 4. RUMI : Msg_bot3 5. RUMI : Msg_bot4 6. RUMI : Msg_bot5 7. RUMI : Msg_bot6 8. RUMI : Msg_bot7 9. RUMI : Msg_bot8 10. RUMI : Msg_bot9

block.field: All kilobots will be able to receive messages from overhead controller
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : infrared_broadcast 2. State variable : messages received from OHC

block.field: kilobots shall be considered as communicating, when they are within 7.5 cm distance from each other
block.comment: kilobots start moving with spiral movement. They will stop when they find a kilobot that have ID=1 or ID!=1 but communicate with ID=1 in some way.
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Msg_bot0 2. RUMI : Msg_bot1 3. RUMI : Msg_bot2 4. RUMI : Msg_bot3 5. RUMI : Msg_bot4 6. RUMI : Msg_bot5 7. RUMI : Msg_bot6 8. RUMI : Msg_bot7 9. RUMI : Msg_bot8 10. RUMI : Msg_bot9

block.field: The connection between all the kilobots shall be established at the beginning of each round
block.comment: kilobots start moving with spiral movement. They will stop when they find a kilobot that have ID=1 or ID!=1 but communicate with ID=1 in some way.

block.field: There should exist a unique kilobot operating as as a central communication coordinator
block.comment: kilobots start moving with spiral movement. They will stop when they find a kilobot that have ID=1 or ID!=1 but communicate with ID=1 in some way.
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. CS : Kilobot_1 2. Service : Service / Central point of communication

block.field: Availability: charged battery is necessary for kilobots
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State space : Motions 2. State space : Motions 3. State space : Motions 4. State space : Motions 5. State space : Motions 6. State space : Motions 7. State space : Motions 8. State space : Motions 9. State space : Motions 10. State space : Motions

block.field: Reliability: the kilobots have to start each game round only when they communicate with all the others because they don’t provide the necessary service
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. System resource : Battery 2. System resource : Battery 3. System resource : Battery 4. System resource : Battery 5. System resource : Battery 6. System resource : Battery 7. System resource : Battery 8. System resource : Battery 9. System resource : Battery 10. System resource : Battery

block.field: Integrity: It is fundamental that this SoS doesn’t have improper state to function correctly

block.field: A kilobot moving out of range of communication will start moving to find the other kilobots to become a part of the netwok again

block.field: Each kilobot will have a notion of time based internal clock
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Physical clock : Kiloticks

block.field: Kilobots shall be able to communicate over their network within 10 seconds for every message sent

block.comment:
This is an example System-of-Systems (SoS) block named "example_block", on the work-space.
You may: 1. Drag the block/work-space with the mouse. 2. Minimize / Maximize / Partially minimize a block by double clicking on it. 3. Drag and drop new blocks from the Toolbox from *left* hand side. 4. Add related blocks to this block by clicking (+) drop-down below. 5. Right click on the block/work-space to see a menu. 6. Close this *comment* by clicking on the (?) button.
because the infrared sensor can't read nothing distant more than 7.5 cm
